text: Whirlpool is a 1949 American crime drama movie directed by Otto Preminger and based on the novel Methinks the Lady by Guy Endore. It stars Gene Tierney, Richard Conte, Jos√© Ferrer, Charles Bickford, Barbara O'Neil, Eduard Franz, Constance Collier and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Otto Preminger
title: Whirlpool (movie)
